paper_abstract: Most of the interesting groups encountered in the physics literature are semidirect product groups. These groups are of the general form G = Hx(tau) K, where H and K are locally compact groups. In this paper, we consider the quasi regular representation on such a group G and investigate when it is possible to construct a family of coherent states associated to this representation.
paper_title: ON CONSTRUCTION OF COHERENT STATES ASSOCIATED WITH SEMIDIRECT PRODUCTS
